Detailed Description

cvmx_psm_dbg_break_cfg

This register configures the debug breakpoint mechanism. When a breakpoint is triggered, the PSM triggers a PSM_TRACE_BKPT interrupt, and can optionally halt. While halted, the PSM will not schedule any new jobs or execute any commands from the 48 queues, but jobs can still complete, job completion commands can still execute, and new commands may still be added to the queues. The queues can be un-halted by re-enabling the queues (i.e., a write to PSM_QUEUE_ENA_W1S, or a QRUN command received from a MHAB/MDAB).
